Docs.summary: This method is called when there is a new message to process, before the job function is invoked. This allows any preprocessing to take place on the message before processing begins.
Docs.returns: A that returns true if the message processing should continue, false otherwise.

Docs.summary: This method completes processing of the specified message, after the job function has been invoked.
Docs.returns: A that will complete the message processing.
Docs.remarks: The message is completed by the ServiceBus SDK based on how the option is configured. E.g. if is false, it is up to the job function to complete the message.
